greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of decimal digits not appearing in n.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index entries for Colombian or self numbers and related sequences
formula: a(n) = 0 for almost all n. Average order is n^-0.045 where the exponent is log(0.9)/log(10). - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Oct 15 2012
program: (PARI) { a(n) = local( d = vecsort( eval(Vec(Str(n))),,8) ); 45 - sum(i=1,#d,d[i]) }
results.author: Xenia Sheinerman, Oct 15 2012
